SELECT S.NO, S.TITLE, S.CONTENT, S.REGIST_DATE, S.MODIFY_DATE, S.CLASSIFY_CODE, S.REF_MEMBER_NO, S.DELETE_YN FROM TBL_ADMIN_BOARD S
S.CLASSIFY_CODE = '공지사항'
S.CLASSIFY_CODE = '이벤트'
S.CLASSIFY_CODE = '보도자료'
ORDER BY S.NO ASC

SELECT F.NO AS FILE_NO, F.ORIGIN_NAME, F.CHANGE_NAME, F.REGIST_DATE, F.DELETE_YN, B.NO AS BOARD_NO, B.TITLE AS BOARD_TITLE, B.CONTENT AS BOARD_CONTENT, B.REGIST_DATE AS BOARD_REGIST_DATE, B.MODIFY_DATE AS BOARD_MODIFY_DATE, B.DELETE_YN AS BOARD_DELETE_YN, B.CLASSIFY_CODE AS BOARD_CLASSIFY_CODE, M.NO AS MEMBER_NO, M.NAME AS MEMBER_NAME, M.EMAIL AS EMAIL FROM TBL_ADMIN_BOARD_FILE F JOIN TBL_ADMIN_BOARD B ON F.REF_ADMIN_BOARD_NO = B.NO JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON B.NO = M.NO
SELECT S.NO, S.TITLE, S.CONTENT, S.REGIST_DATE, S.MODIFY_DATE, S.CLASSIFY_CODE, S.REF_MEMBER_NO, S.DELETE_YN FROM TBL_ADMIN_BOARD S WHERE S.CLASSIFY_CODE = '공지사항'
SELECT S.NO, S.TITLE, S.CONTENT, S.REGIST_DATE, S.MODIFY_DATE, S.CLASSIFY_CODE, S.REF_MEMBER_NO, S.DELETE_YN FROM TBL_ADMIN_BOARD S WHERE S.CLASSIFY_CODE = '이벤트'
SELECT S.NO, S.TITLE, S.CONTENT, S.REGIST_DATE, S.MODIFY_DATE, S.CLASSIFY_CODE, S.REF_MEMBER_NO, S.DELETE_YN FROM TBL_ADMIN_BOARD S WHERE S.CLASSIFY_CODE = '보도자료'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_ADMIN_BOARD (NO, TITLE, CONTENT, REGIST_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, CLASSIFY_CODE, REF_MEMBER_NO, DELETE_YN) VALUES (SEQ_TBL_ADMIN_BOARD_NO.NEXTVAL, #{title} , #{content}, SYSDATE, '', #{category}, #{refmemberno}, 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TBL_ADMIN_BOARD ORDER BY REGIST_DATE DESC
